event.description: Denard Span singles on a ground ball to second baseman Placido Polanco.
Alexi Casilla ground bunts into a double play, pitcher Edwin Jackson to first baseman Miguel Cabrera to shortstop Adam Everett. Denard Span out at 2nd.
Joe Mauer strikes out swinging.
Justin Morneau flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Jason Kubel doubles (8) on a fly ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Joe Crede flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Michael Cuddyer singles on a ground ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson. Jason Kubel scores.
Delmon Young strikes out swinging.
Nick Punto strikes out swinging.

Jason Kubel strikes out swinging.

Michael Cuddyer walks.
Delmon Young grounds into a double play, third baseman Brandon Inge to second baseman Placido Polanco to first baseman Miguel Cabrera. Michael Cuddyer out at 2nd.
Nick Punto strikes out swinging, catcher Gerald Laird to first baseman Miguel Cabrera.
Denard Span flies out to right fielder Magglio Ordonez.
Alexi Casilla flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.

Michael Cuddyer triples (2) on a fly ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson. Jason Kubel scores. Joe Crede scores.
Pitching Change: Brandon Lyon replaces Edwin Jackson.
Delmon Young hit by pitch.
Nick Punto reaches on a fielder's choice out, first baseman Miguel Cabrera to catcher Gerald Laird. Michael Cuddyer out at home. Delmon Young to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Clay Rapada replaces Brandon Lyon.
Denard Span singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Guillen. Delmon Young to 3rd. Nick Punto to 2nd.

Jason Kubel called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Ryan Perry replaces Clay Rapada.
Joe Crede flies out to right fielder Magglio Ordonez.
Michael Cuddyer called out on strikes.

Nick Punto flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson. Carlos Gomez to 3rd.

Defensive switch from center field to left field for Denard Span.

Placido Polanco doubles (11) on a ground ball to left fielder Denard Span. Adam Everett to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Matt Guerrier replaces Francisco Liriano.
